Action.author: scottz
Action.body: FAB-11374 and FAB-11382 are marked stale (and will likely be closed within a week). Is any of this PTE enhancement still needed or useful? ~dongming

Action.author: dongming
Action.body: ~scottz at this moment, we do not have PTE plan or enhancement related to cc2cc. We can mark this as stale.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: Fabric and sdk code was never developed that would necessitate this tool enhancement.
